General.Name: Finlay Minerals Ltd
General.Description: Finlay Minerals Ltd. engages in the acquisition and exploration of base and precious metal deposits in northern British Columbia, Canada. It focuses on the exploration for gold-copper porphyry, epithermal gold, and mesothermal silver-copper targets. The company holds 100% interests in the Silver Hope property comprising 45 mineral tenures located in the Houston, British Columbia; and Atty property that includes 15 mineral tenure claims and PIL property consisting of 39 mineral tenures located in the Toodoggone mineral district. Finlay Minerals Ltd. was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 800 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2V6
